newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Goldman on Novell.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Goldman on Novell.

text.p: - Goldman Sachs analyst Rick Sherlund, who was hosting a Novell presentation at a New York investor conference, called a speech by president and chief operating officer Joseph Marengi "encouraging" and a solid indication that the company "is beginning to think strategically again."
- Sherlund rates the stock a market performer.
- The analyst did not comment at the conference on his rating.
- Novell shares were up 3/8 at 12 late in the day.
